intro: Gymnosporia bupleuroides, commonly known as the African silver bush, is a shrub native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Rhamnaceae and is characterized by its small, inconspicuous flowers and woody stems. Due to its hardy nature, it is sometimes used in ecological restoration projects.
